2001.title: Scooter
2001.subtitle: RENTAL
2001.description: Scan QR code to reserve or unlock the scooter.

dialogContent.textAllowBuy: Scan QR to reserve/use the scooter

exchanged.exchangedText: Less traffic, cleaner air, and safer streets. Scooters cut the use of vehicles and reduce the volume of traffic on the road.

3001.title: Reserve desk
3001.subtitle: SMART OFFICE
3001.description: Scan QR code to reserve or unlock the desk.

dialogContent.textAllowBuy: Scan QR to unlock and reserve/use the desk

exchanged.exchangedText: A new site every day can lead to conversations with future collaborators. With everything included – high-speed internet, office furniture and utilities - just scan the QR code of the desk and get to work.
